trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_SEQ_00<tab>Guildmaster Geva wishes to evaluate your progress.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_SEQ_01<tab>In order to evaluate your progress, Geva instructs you to prepare three leather chokers. Craft the items as requested and present them to her.

TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_SEQ_02<tab>Geva declares your workmanship satisfactory─for a jobbing leatherworker. She rewards you with an amateur's awl and reminds you to work hard if you wish to rise from obscurity and become a famous <var 08 E905 ((craftswoman)) ((craftsman)) /var>.
※The next leatherworker quest will be available from Geva upon reaching level 10.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_TODO_00<tab>Deliver leather chokers to Geva.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_1<tab>Getting used to that knife I gave you? Gods know it doesn't happen very often, but you've chanced to find me unoccupied. How about you show me what you've learned?
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_2<tab>Let's see you make three leather chokers.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_3<tab>After all, there's more to our craft than simply tanning hides, and chokers are just about the simplest things one can make.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_4<tab>You'll need circles of leather and animal sinew to accomplish this task. Osgyth can provide the sinew, and I'm sure you recall the method for making leather.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_5<tab>I hope your technique has improved since last time.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_6<tab>Now, while we have an ample stock of skins, there are other means of procuring your materials.

TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_7<tab>Hunting for your own pelts, for instance. Aye, I know what I said about that before. But that was about assuming it was <var 1A 02 /var>necessary<var 1A 01 /var>. <var 1A 02 /var>Choosing<var 1A 01 /var> to do so is another matter. Indeed, it may teach you to appreciate the source of your livelihood.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_8<tab>Not all leatherworkers are wont to choose this method...but you are an adventurer, are you not?
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_9<tab>When you've finished your work, bring your chokers here for inspection.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_20<tab>You've finished your work, then?
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_21<tab>I suppose there is no denying that these are leather chokers.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_22<tab>If truth be told, an opo<var 1F /var>opo could've achieved similar results given skins, sinew, and time.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_23<tab>Oh, but I don't mean to make light of your efforts. You fulfilled the order precisely as requested─a job well done.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_24<tab>Now then, I will teach you something to supplement your learning.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_25<tab>Through physical training, the body can be made strong and resistant to injury. Not so the throat, which ever remains a vulnerable point.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_26<tab>Although a leather choker provides less protection than a metal gorget, its simple design makes it ideal for everyday applications.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_27<tab>This simplicity also makes it an ideal choice for beginners practicing basic techniques─and for guildmasters assessing their progress.

TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_28<tab>As you are, you would make a passable leatherworker─one among the nameless multitudes who scrape a living out there. Whether you rise to become something more is contingent upon your efforts.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_29<tab>Consider this amateur's awl a reward for your efforts.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_30<tab>You will find it an indispensable partner to the head knife as you continue your training.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_31<tab>Now, I must return to my work. If you chance to find me unoccupied again, mayhap I will teach you something else.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_GEVA_000_32<tab>Till then, keep your nose to the grindstone!

TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_SYSTEM_000_40<tab>Certain gear grants bonuses to your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>craftsmanship<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>control<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>CP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> values.

TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_SYSTEM_000_41<tab>A higher craftsmanship rating hastens the progress of synthesis; greater control increases the chance of creating high-quality items; and additional CP improves your crafting stamina.
TEXT_CLSTAN001_00106_SYSTEM_000_42<tab>Outfitting yourself with an eye to your current objective will increase the efficiency of your crafting endeavors.
